name: lookup_funcs
description: Get functions by address or name (auto-detects)

size.description: Byte size for conversion (omit for auto)
Byte size for conversion (omit for auto)

inputs.description: Convert numbers to various formats (hex, decimal, binary, ascii)

filter.description: Optional glob pattern to filter results

count.description: Maximum number of results (default: 50, 0 for all)

filter.description: Optional glob pattern to filter results

count.description: Maximum number of results (default: 50, 0 for all)

queries.description: List functions with optional filtering and pagination

filter.description: Optional glob pattern to filter results

count.description: Maximum number of results (default: 50, 0 for all)

filter.description: Optional glob pattern to filter results

count.description: Maximum number of results (default: 50, 0 for all)

queries.description: List global variables with optional filtering and pagination

filter.description: Optional glob pattern to filter results

count.description: Maximum number of results (default: 50, 0 for all)

filter.description: Optional glob pattern to filter results

count.description: Maximum number of results (default: 50, 0 for all)

queries.description: List strings with optional filtering and pagination

name: xrefs_to
description: Get all cross-references to specified addresses

name: callees
description: Get all functions called by the specified functions

addrs.description: Function addresses to get callees for

name: callers
description: Get all functions that call the specified functions

addrs.description: Function addresses to get callers for

name: analyze_funcs
description: Comprehensive function analysis: decompilation, xrefs, callees, strings, constants, blocks

name: find_bytes
description: Search for byte patterns in the binary (supports wildcards with ??)

name: find_insns
description: Search for sequences of instruction mnemonics in the binary

sequences.description: Instruction mnemonic sequences to search for

name: basic_blocks
description: Get control flow graph basic blocks for functions

addrs.description: Function addresses to get basic blocks for

max_blocks.description: Max basic blocks per function (default: 1000, max: 10000)

name: find_paths
description: Find execution paths between source and target addresses

name: search
description: Search for patterns in the binary (strings, immediate values, or references)

name: find_insn_operands
description: Find instructions with specific mnemonics and operand values

op0.description: Value to match in first operand

op1.description: Value to match in second operand

op2.description: Value to match in third operand

op_any.description: Value to match in any operand

op0.description: Value to match in first operand

op1.description: Value to match in second operand

op2.description: Value to match in third operand

op_any.description: Value to match in any operand

name: export_funcs
description: Export function data in various formats

format.description: Export format: json (default), c_header, or prototypes

name: callgraph
description: Build call graph starting from root functions

roots.description: Root function addresses to start call graph traversal from

max_depth.description: Maximum depth for call graph traversal

name: xref_matrix
description: Build matrix showing cross-references between entities

entities.description: Addresses to build cross-reference matrix for

name: analyze_strings
description: Analyze and filter strings in the binary

pattern.description: Optional pattern to match in strings
Optional pattern to match in strings

addr.description: Address to read from (hex or decimal)
Address to read from (hex or decimal)

name: get_u8
description: Read 8-bit unsigned integers from memory addresses

addrs.description: Addresses to read 8-bit unsigned integers from

name: get_u16
description: Read 16-bit unsigned integers from memory addresses

addrs.description: Addresses to read 16-bit unsigned integers from

name: get_u32
description: Read 32-bit unsigned integers from memory addresses

addrs.description: Addresses to read 32-bit unsigned integers from

name: get_u64
description: Read 64-bit unsigned integers from memory addresses

addrs.description: Addresses to read 64-bit unsigned integers from

name: get_global_value
description:
Read global variable values by address or name
    (auto-detects hex addresses vs names)

queries.description: Global variable addresses or names to read values from

name: patch
description: Patch bytes at memory addresses with hex data

filter.description: Case-insensitive substring to search for in structure names

name: set_comments
description: Set comments at addresses (both disassembly and decompiler views)

name: rename
description: Unified rename operation for functions, globals, locals, and stack variables

func_addr.description: Function address containing the local variable
Function address containing the local variable
Function address containing the stack variable
Function address containing the stack variable

tids.description: Thread ID(s) to get registers for
Thread ID(s) to get GP registers for

addr.description: Address to read from (hex or decimal)
Address to read from (hex or decimal)

name: py_eval
description:
Execute Python code in IDA context.
    Returns dict with result/stdout/stderr.
    Has access to all IDA API modules.
    Supports Jupyter-style evaluation.
